title: Mobile Microlearning Technology Utilization Training for Construction Engineering Practitioners

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic construction terminology and elementary engineering concepts
context.additional_context: Mobile-based short-term intensive training for in-service construction professionals, with interactive learning environments using digital devices (tablets/smartphones)

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic BIM (Building Information Modeling) functions applicable to construction sites with over 85% accuracy.
Learners can understand and apply structural stability analysis procedures with over 90% accuracy using simulation tools provided via a mobile app.
Learners can conduct real-time project feedback with peers at least three times using a collaborative platform.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
